Summary: Late night. Like a star moving. Faster than anything possible.
divs: Sighting DetailsTaking an early morning walk. Just used to lookling up when airplanes fly by but this this was turning at 90 degrees every turn it took. and it crossed the horizon from east to north west in like 2 to 3 mins! Never seen something move so fast and take such turns. this event happened ages back. but its a vision i can never erase from my mind. I've been telling people what i have witnessed since then but no one except one of my friends who was with me can relate to it. I just came across this site. and knew this had to be it. Lost sight of it when it jus disappeared across the horizon!
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Pune
There were no other sightings in Pune on or around January 5th 2003
